panels.description: HTTP request rate across all endpoints (requests per second). Tracks overall traffic volume to Global Controller.
panels.title: HTTP Request Rate by Endpoint

panels.description: HTTP request latency percentiles (p50, p95, p99) with SLO threshold line at 200ms. Violations indicate latency SLO breach.
panels.title: HTTP Request Latency (P50/P95/P99)

panels.description: HTTP error rate as percentage of total requests. Green = <0.1%, Yellow = 0.1-1%, Red = >1% (SLO violation).
panels.title: HTTP Error Rate (%)

panels.description: Breakdown of HTTP requests by status code category (2xx success, 4xx client error, 5xx server error).
panels.title: HTTP Status Codes

panels.description: MC assignment rate (assignments per second). Tracks how frequently meetings are being assigned to Meeting Controllers.
panels.title: MC Assignment Rate by Status

panels.description: MC assignment latency percentiles with SLO threshold at 20ms (ADR-0010). Critical path for meeting join performance.
panels.title: MC Assignment Latency (P50/P95/P99)

panels.description: MC assignment success rate as percentage. Green = >99%, Yellow = 95-99%, Red = <95%.
panels.title: MC Assignment Success Rate (%)

panels.description: Database query rate by operation type. Tracks query volume across different database operations.
panels.title: Database Query Rate by Operation

panels.description: Database query latency percentiles. Monitors database performance and identifies slow queries.
panels.title: Database Query Latency (P50/P95/P99)

panels.description: Service health status. 1 = up, 0 = down. Monitors whether GC pods are running and responding to probes.
panels.title: Service Status

panels.description: Number of running GC pods. Monitors pod availability and scaling.
panels.title: Pod Count

panels.description: Memory usage across GC pods. Monitors memory consumption and potential leaks.
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: CPU usage across GC pods. Monitors CPU consumption and load patterns.
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Token refresh attempts by status (success/error). Tracks AC token lifecycle health.
panels.title: Token Refresh Rate by Status

panels.description: Token refresh latency percentiles (p50, p95, p99).
panels.title: Token Refresh Latency (P50/P95/P99)

panels.description: Token refresh failures by error type. High rate indicates AC connectivity issues.
panels.title: Token Refresh Failures by Type

panels.description: Requests to Auth Controller by operation and status.
panels.title: AC Request Rate by Operation

panels.description: AC client request latency percentiles (p50, p95, p99).
panels.title: AC Request Latency (P50/P95/P99)

panels.description: gRPC calls to Meeting Controllers by method and status.
panels.title: gRPC MC Call Rate

panels.description: gRPC call latency to Meeting Controllers (p50, p95, p99).
panels.title: gRPC MC Call Latency (P50/P95/P99)

panels.description: Media Handler selection attempts by status and backup availability.
panels.title: MH Selection Rate by Status

panels.description: MH selection latency percentiles (p50, p95, p99).
panels.title: MH Selection Latency (P50/P95/P99)

panels.description: Meeting creation attempts by status (success/error). Tracks meeting creation volume and success rate.
panels.title: Meeting Creation Rate by Status

panels.description: Meeting creation latency percentiles (p50, p95, p99).
panels.title: Meeting Creation Latency (P50/P95/P99)

panels.description: Meeting creation failures by error type. High rate may indicate org limit exhaustion or DB issues.
panels.title: Meeting Creation Failures by Type

panels.description: Number of registered controllers by type and health status.
panels.title: Registered Controllers by Type & Status

panels.description: Error rate by operation and error type. Note: operation labels use subsystem prefixes (e.g., ac_meeting_token, mc_grpc) unlike per-subsystem metrics which use unprefixed names.
panels.title: Errors by Operation & Type
